NOT_STRING: The {property} field must be a string.
NOT_NUMBER: The {property} field must contain only numbers.
NOT_ALPHA: The {property} field may only contain alphabetical characters.
NOT_EMAIL: The {property} field must be in email format.
MIN: The {property} field must be at least {constraints.0} characters in length.
MAX: The {property} field cannot exceed {constraints.0} characters in length.
BETWEEN: The {property} must be between {constraints.0} and {constraints.1} characters.
LESS_THAN_EQUAL_TO: The {property} field must contain a number less than or equal to {constraints.0}.
GREATER_THAN_EQUAL_TO: The {property} field must contain a number greater than or equal to {constraints.0}.
IN_LIST: The {property} field must be one of: {list}.
INVALID_PASSWORD: New password invalid. You need at least 8 characters.
NOT_ALPHANUMERIC: The {property} must contain only letters and numbers
AGE_UNDER_18: You must be at least 18 years old
NOT_BOOLEAN: The {property} field must be a boolean.
